title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Feb 4 2022
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Feb 4 2022
description:
Already Savannah Guthrie, NBC and even Nancy Pelosi are kowtowing to Xi Jinping. Biden’s Lame And Untrue Attacks On Gun Rights. Clay & Buck talk to Alex Berenson about the latest on Covid. Plus Clay & Buck talk to Sen. Ted Cruz (R-TX) talking SCOTUS, Ukraine, China Olympics and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
